description: This file defines the class EnumNativeCodeProducer, which is responsible for generating native code representations of enum definitions in a code generation framework. It includes methods for creating enum buffers and native typedefs, but explicitly does not generate standalone enum code. It interacts with other classes such as EnumDefWrapper, EnumVariable, and uses a Context object. The class is part of a code generation tool that handles native enum code production within a larger project.

classes.name: EnumNativeCodeProducer
classes.description: A class responsible for generating native code (such as typedefs, labels, and short names) for enum definitions within a code generation framework, specifically generating code buffers for native enum representations.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Overrides the base method to indicate that native enum code is not generated independently; always returns false.

methods.name: generateWrapperFile
methods.description: Overrides the base method to indicate that wrapper files are not created standalone for native enums; always returns false.

methods.name: generateWrapperBuffer
methods.description: Generates a string buffer containing the native enum code (typedefs, labels, short names) for a specific wrapper.

methods.name: generateNativeEnums
methods.description: Generates a native code string buffer for a list of enum wrappers, optionally setting header filename info.

methods.name: generateNativeWrapperBuffer
methods.description: Creates native typedefs and labels/short names in the provided buffer for a specific EnumDefWrapper.
